questions.text: You wake up to find you can read minds, but only of people who are currently eating pizza. You:

options.text: Open a pizza restaurant to exploit this power.
Use it to blackmail people into giving you free pizza.
Avoid pizza places to respect people's privacy.
Assume everyone is thinking about how to kill you.

questions.text: A genie offers you three wishes, but each wish must make someone else's life worse. You:

options.text: Wish for world peace, knowing it will cause chaos.
Wish for unlimited wishes to maximize suffering.
Wish to undo the genie's existence.
Decline, fearing the genie's hidden agenda.

questions.text: You discover your cat has been running a successful underground gambling ring. You:

options.text: Take over the operation and expand it.
Turn your cat in to the authorities.
Blackmail your cat for a cut of the profits.
Assume this is a test by the government.

questions.text: You find out your reflection has been living a separate life when you're not looking. You:

options.text: Try to communicate and form an alliance.
Smash all mirrors to prevent further betrayal.
Document its activities for scientific study.
Assume it's plotting to replace you.

questions.text: Your houseplants start giving you stock market advice. You:

options.text: Create a hedge fund based on their predictions.
Sell all your plants in a panic.
Research plant communication scientifically.
Assume they're trying to bankrupt you.

questions.text: You discover your shadow has been attending parties without you. You:

options.text: Train it to be your social double.
Try to catch it in the act and confront it.
Set up cameras to document its activities.
Stay indoors to prevent further betrayal.

questions.text: Your morning coffee starts giving you life advice. You:

options.text: Start a podcast featuring your coffee's wisdom.
Throw it out and switch to tea immediately.
Record its advice for later analysis.
Assume it's trying to manipulate you.

questions.text: You find out your dreams are actually real events in a parallel universe. You:

options.text: Start a business selling dream interpretations.
Try to stay awake forever to prevent chaos.
Document your dreams for scientific study.
Assume you're being watched by dream police.
